verses.roman:
gopīnāthācāryake kahe sārvabhauma
'tumi gosāñire lañā karāiha daraśana

synonyms: gopīnātha-ācāryake—to Gopīnātha Ācārya; kahe—says; sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; tumi—you; gosāñire—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lañā—taking; karāiha—make Him do; daraśana—seeing of Lord Jagannātha.
translation: Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya then told Gopīnātha Ācārya, "Take Gosvāmījī and show Him Lord Jagannātha.
